item.title: The story of Multi-Cloud!
item.description: This is not just a tech blog but a story behind as well. I recently switched my job and moved from AWS to Azure at workplace. Also, I am exploring GCP for my personal stuff. Still I don’t know enough to choose a personal favorite. ðŸ˜‹ What&rsquo;s your biggest skill? The most interesting question I ever had in any interview is, “What drives you to be a better engineer?” To which my never changing thought is I am a curious person.
